meanings.definition: The skin of a seal, used for making clothing or other items.
meanings.sent1: The Inuit people crafted warm mittens from sealskin.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stylish coat made of sealskin to stay cozy in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: The sealskin boots danced away on their own, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as smooth as sealskin, calming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The touch of sealskin against her skin brought back memories of the sea.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a traditional Inuit sealskin parka.
meanings.sent2: He purchased a sealskin hat as a souvenir from his trip to Alaska.
meanings.sent3: The sealskin jacket seemed to have a mind of its own, always finding its way back to its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her words wrapped around him like a sealskin cloak, offering comfort and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The elegance of the sealskin dress made her feel like royalty at the ball.
